title: Patch bug?
body:
Every time I try to load into a game or a custom game i get the black/white screen of death.

I cant ult tab out I'm legit stuck there and have to turn my computer off.

Is this a patch bug that other people are experiencing or do i need to burn my computer and yeet it out my window?

replies.body: I'm afraid that's not one I have any idea how to fix. I can recommend running a full reinstall, but past that submitting a ticket to player support is going to be your best chance at an answer: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
